readable.title: 3282925526_535ff9f2b2
readable.content: A man lying down with a maroon cloth over his eyes and someone standing over him wearing flip flops . A man napping on the ground with a shirt over his eyes with a person standing beside him . A man on the pavement shielding his eyes with his t-shirt . A man wearing a maroon shirt tied around his face is laying on the cement A man with a dark red shirt covering his face rests on the pavement near a person 's feet .
